ayah: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ فَاطِرِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَاعِلِ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ رُسُلًا أُوْلِيٓ أَجۡنِحَةٖ مَّثۡنَىٰ وَثُلَٰثَ وَرُبَٰعَۚ يَزِيدُ فِي ٱلۡخَلۡقِ مَا يَشَآءُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ
ayah_translit: al-hamdu lillahi fatiri al-samawati wal-ardi ja'ili al-malaikati rusulan uli ajnihatin mathna wathulatha waruba'a yazidu fi al-khalqi ma yashau inna al-laha ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: All praises (be) to Allah Creator (of) the heavens and the earth (Who) makes the Angels messengers having wings having wings two or three or four He increases in the creation what He wills Indeed Allah (is) on every thing All-Powerful

ayah: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ فَاطِرِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَاعِلِ ٱلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ رُسُلًا أُوْلِيٓ أَجۡنِحَةٖ مَّثۡنَىٰ وَثُلَٰثَ وَرُبَٰعَۚ يَزِيدُ فِي ٱلۡخَلۡقِ مَا يَشَآءُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٞ

ayah_translit: al-hamdu lillahi fatiri al-samawati wal-ardi ja'ili al-malaikati rusulan uli ajnihatin mathna wathulatha waruba'a yazidu fi al-khalqi ma yashau inna al-laha ala kulli shayin qadirun
ayah_english: All praises (be) to Allah Creator (of) the heavens and the earth (Who) makes the Angels messengers having wings having wings two or three or four He increases in the creation what He wills Indeed Allah (is) on every thing All-Powerful

ayah: مَّا يَفۡتَحِ ٱللَّهُ لِلنَّاسِ مِن رَّحۡمَةٖ فَلَا مُمۡسِكَ لَهَاۖ وَمَا يُمۡسِكۡ فَلَا مُرۡسِلَ لَهُۥ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ
ayah_translit: ma yaftahi al-lahu lilnnasi min rahmatin fala mum'sika laha wama yum'sik fala mur'sila lahu min ba'dihi wahuwa al-'azizu al-hakimu
ayah_english: What Allah grants Allah grants to mankind of Mercy then none (can) withhold it And what He withholds then none (can) release it thereafter thereafter And He (is) the All-Mighty the All-Wise

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ ٱذۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡكُمۡۚ هَلۡ مِنۡ خَٰلِقٍ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِ يَرۡزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nasu udh'kuru ni'mata al-lahi alaykum hal min khaliqin ghayru al-lahi yarzuqukum mina al-samai wal-ardi la ilaha illa huwa fa-anna tu'fakuna
ayah_english: O mankind Remember (the) Favor (of) Allah upon you Is (there) any creator other (than) Allah other (than) Allah who provides for you from the sky and the earth (There is) no god but He Then, how (are) you deluded

ayah: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدۡ كُذِّبَتۡ رُسُلٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكَۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ
ayah_translit: wa-in yukadhibuka faqad kudhibat rusulun min qablika wa-ila al-lahi tur'ja'u al-umuru
ayah_english: And if they deny you then certainly were denied Messengers before you before you And to Allah return the matters

ayah: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدۡ كُذِّبَتۡ رُسُلٞ مِّن قَبۡلِكَۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

ayah_english: And if they deny you then certainly were denied Messengers before you before you And to Allah return the matters

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞۖ فَلَا تَغُرَّنَّكُمُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَلَا يَغُرَّنَّكُم بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡغَرُورُ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nasu inna wa'da al-lahi haqqun fala taghurrannakumu al-hayatu al-dun'ya wala yaghurrannakum bil-lahi al-gharuru
ayah_english: O mankind! Indeed (the) promise (of) Allah (is) true So (let) not deceive you the life (of) the world and (let) not deceive you about Allah the Deceiver

ayah: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞۖ فَلَا تَغُرَّنَّكُمُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَلَا يَغُرَّنَّكُم بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡغَرُورُ

ayah_english: O mankind! Indeed (the) promise (of) Allah (is) true So (let) not deceive you the life (of) the world and (let) not deceive you about Allah the Deceiver

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ فَٱتَّخِذُوهُ عَدُوًّاۚ إِنَّمَا يَدۡعُواْ حِزۡبَهُۥ لِيَكُونُواْ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
ayah_translit: inna al-shaytana lakum aduwwun fa-ittakhidhuhu aduwwan innama yad'u hiz'bahu liyakunu min ashabi al-sa'iri
ayah_english: Indeed the Shaitaan (is) to you an enemy so take him (as) an enemy Only he invites his party that they may be among (the) companions (of) the Blaze

ayah_english: Indeed the Shaitaan (is) to you an enemy so take him (as) an enemy Only he invites his party that they may be among (the) companions (of) the Blaze

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ فَٱتَّخِذُوهُ عَدُوًّاۚ إِنَّمَا يَدۡعُواْ حِزۡبَهُۥ لِيَكُونُواْ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٞۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٌ
ayah_translit: alladhina kafaru lahum adhabun shadidun wa-alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati lahum maghfiratun wa-ajrun kabirun
ayah_english: Those who disbelieve for them (will be) a punishment severe and those who believe and do righteous deeds for them (will be) forgiveness and a reward great

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٞۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُم مَّغۡفِرَةٞ وَأَجۡرٞ كَبِيرٌ

ayah: أَفَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُۥ سُوٓءُ عَمَلِهِۦ فَرَءَاهُ حَسَنٗاۖ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُضِلُّ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُۖ فَلَا تَذۡهَبۡ نَفۡسُكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَسَرَٰتٍۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِمَا يَصۡنَعُونَ
ayah_translit: afaman zuyyina lahu suu amalihi faraahu hasanan fa-inna al-laha yudillu man yashau wayahdi man yashau fala tadhhab nafsuka alayhim hasaratin inna al-laha alimun bima yasna'una
ayah_english: Then is (he) who is made fair-seeming to him (the) evil (of) his deed so that he sees it (as) good For indeed Allah lets go astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills So (let) not go out your soul for them (in) regrets Indeed Allah (is) All-Knower of what they do

ayah: أَفَمَن زُيِّنَ لَهُۥ سُوٓءُ عَمَلِهِۦ فَرَءَاهُ حَسَنٗاۖ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُضِلُّ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُۖ فَلَا تَذۡهَبۡ نَفۡسُكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَسَرَٰتٍۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِمَا يَصۡنَعُونَ

ayah: وَٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَرۡسَلَ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ فَتُثِيرُ سَحَابٗا فَسُقۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ بَلَدٖ مَّيِّتٖ فَأَحۡيَيۡنَا بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلنُّشُورُ
ayah_translit: wal-lahu alladhi arsala al-riyaha fatuthiru sahaban fasuq'nahu ila baladin mayyitin fa-ahyayna bihi al-arda ba'da mawtiha kadhalika al-nushuru
ayah_english: And Allah (is) the One Who sends the winds so that they raise (the) clouds and We drive them to a land dead and We revive therewith the earth after its death Thus (will be) the Resurrection

ayah: وَٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَرۡسَلَ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ فَتُثِيرُ سَحَابٗا فَسُقۡنَٰهُ إِلَىٰ بَلَدٖ مَّيِّتٖ فَأَحۡيَيۡنَا بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلنُّشُورُ

ayah_english: And Allah (is) the One Who sends the winds so that they raise (the) clouds and We drive them to a land dead and We revive therewith the earth after its death Thus (will be) the Resurrection

ayah: مَن كَانَ يُرِيدُ ٱلۡعِزَّةَ فَلِلَّهِ ٱلۡعِزَّةُ جَمِيعًاۚ إِلَيۡهِ يَصۡعَدُ ٱلۡكَلِمُ ٱلطَّيِّبُ وَٱلۡعَمَلُ ٱلصَّـٰلِحُ يَرۡفَعُهُۥۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ يَمۡكُرُونَ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ لَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ شَدِيدٞۖ وَمَكۡرُ أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ هُوَ يَبُورُ
ayah_translit: man kana yuridu al-'izata falillahi al-'izatu jami'an ilayhi yas'adu al-kalimu al-tayibu wal-'amalu al-salihu yarfa'uhu wa-alladhina yamkuruna al-sayiati lahum adhabun shadidun wamakru ulaika huwa yaburu
ayah_english: Whoever [is] desires [is] desires the honor then for Allah (is) the Honor all To Him ascends the words good and the deed righteous raises it But those who plot the evil for them (is) a punishment severe and (the) plotting (of) those it (will) perish

ayah: وَٱللَّهُ خَلَقَكُم مِّن تُرَابٖ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطۡفَةٖ ثُمَّ جَعَلَكُمۡ أَزۡوَٰجٗاۚ وَمَا تَحۡمِلُ مِنۡ أُنثَىٰ وَلَا تَضَعُ إِلَّا بِعِلۡمِهِۦۚ وَمَا يُعَمَّرُ مِن مُّعَمَّرٖ وَلَا يُنقَصُ مِنۡ عُمُرِهِۦٓ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٍۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ
ayah_translit: wal-lahu khalaqakum min turabin thumma min nut'fatin thumma ja'alakum azwajan wama tahmilu min untha wala tada'u illa bi'il'mihi wama yu'ammaru min mu'ammarin wala yunqasu min umurihi illa fi kitabin inna dhalika ala al-lahi yasirun
ayah_english: And Allah created you from dust then from a sperm-drop then He made you mates And not conceives any female and not gives birth except with His knowledge And not is granted life any aged person and not is lessened from his life but (is) in a Register Indeed that for Allah (is) easy

ayah_translit: wal-lahu khalaqakum min turabin thumma min nut'fatin thumma ja'alakum azwajan wama tahmilu min untha wala tada'u illa bi'il'mihi wama yu'ammaru min mu'ammarin wala yunqasu min umurihi illa fi kitabin inna dhalika ala al-lahi yasirun
ayah_english: And Allah created you from dust then from a sperm-drop then He made you mates And not conceives any female and not gives birth except with His knowledge And not is granted life any aged person and not is lessened from his life but (is) in a Register Indeed that for Allah (is) easy

ayah: وَٱللَّهُ خَلَقَكُم مِّن تُرَابٖ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطۡفَةٖ ثُمَّ جَعَلَكُمۡ أَزۡوَٰجٗاۚ وَمَا تَحۡمِلُ مِنۡ أُنثَىٰ وَلَا تَضَعُ إِلَّا بِعِلۡمِهِۦۚ وَمَا يُعَمَّرُ مِن مُّعَمَّرٖ وَلَا يُنقَصُ مِنۡ عُمُرِهِۦٓ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٍۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ

ayah_english: And Allah created you from dust then from a sperm-drop then He made you mates And not conceives any female and not gives birth except with His knowledge And not is granted life any aged person and not is lessened from his life but (is) in a Register Indeed that for Allah (is) easy

ayah: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡبَحۡرَانِ هَٰذَا عَذۡبٞ فُرَاتٞ سَآئِغٞ شَرَابُهُۥ وَهَٰذَا مِلۡحٌ أُجَاجٞۖ وَمِن كُلّٖ تَأۡكُلُونَ لَحۡمٗا طَرِيّٗا وَتَسۡتَخۡرِجُونَ حِلۡيَةٗ تَلۡبَسُونَهَاۖ وَتَرَى ٱلۡفُلۡكَ فِيهِ مَوَاخِرَ لِتَبۡتَغُواْ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ وَلَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ
ayah_translit: wama yastawi al-bahrani hadha adhbun furatun saighun sharabuhu wahadha mil'hun ujajun wamin kullin takuluna lahman tariyyan watastakhrijuna hil'yatan talbasunaha watara al-ful'ka fihi mawakhira litabtaghu min fadlihi wala'allakum tashkuruna
ayah_english: And not are alike the two seas This (is) fresh sweet pleasant its drink and this salty (and) bitter And from each you eat meat fresh and you extract ornaments you wear them and you see the ships in it cleaving so that you may seek of His Bounty and that you may be grateful

ayah_translit: wama yastawi al-bahrani hadha adhbun furatun saighun sharabuhu wahadha mil'hun ujajun wamin kullin takuluna lahman tariyyan watastakhrijuna hil'yatan talbasunaha watara al-ful'ka fihi mawakhira litabtaghu min fadlihi wala'allakum tashkuruna

ayah: يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَۖ كُلّٞ يَجۡرِي لِأَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗىۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ لَهُ ٱلۡمُلۡكُۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِن قِطۡمِيرٍ
ayah_translit: yuliju al-layla fi al-nahari wayuliju al-nahara fi al-layli wasakhara al-shamsa wal-qamara kullun yajri li-ajalin musamman dhalikumu al-lahu rabbukum lahu al-mul'ku wa-alladhina tad'una min dunihi ma yamlikuna min qit'mirin
ayah_english: He causes to enter the night in (to) the day and He causes to enter the day in (to) the night and He has subjected the sun and the moon each running for a term appointed That (is) Allah your Lord for Him (is) the Dominion And those whom you invoke besides Him besides Him not they possess even (as much as) the membrane of a date-seed

ayah: يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِ وَسَخَّرَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَۖ كُلّٞ يَجۡرِي لِأَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗىۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ لَهُ ٱلۡمُلۡكُۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِن قِطۡمِيرٍ

ayah_english: He causes to enter the night in (to) the day and He causes to enter the day in (to) the night and He has subjected the sun and the moon each running for a term appointed That (is) Allah your Lord for Him (is) the Dominion And those whom you invoke besides Him besides Him not they possess even (as much as) the membrane of a date-seed

word_tranlation: (as much as) the membrane of a date-seed

ayah: إِن تَدۡعُوهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُواْ دُعَآءَكُمۡ وَلَوۡ سَمِعُواْ مَا ٱسۡتَجَابُواْ لَكُمۡۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ يَكۡفُرُونَ بِشِرۡكِكُمۡۚ وَلَا يُنَبِّئُكَ مِثۡلُ خَبِيرٖ
ayah_translit: in tad'uhum la yasma'u du'aakum walaw sami'u ma is'tajabu lakum wayawma al-qiyamati yakfuruna bishir'kikum wala yunabbi-uka mith'lu khabirin
ayah_english: If you invoke them not they hear your call and if they heard not they (would) respond to you And (on the) Day (of) the Resurrection they will deny your association And none can inform you like (the) All-Aware

ayah: إِن تَدۡعُوهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُواْ دُعَآءَكُمۡ وَلَوۡ سَمِعُواْ مَا ٱسۡتَجَابُواْ لَكُمۡۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ يَكۡفُرُونَ بِشِرۡكِكُمۡۚ وَلَا يُنَبِّئُكَ مِثۡلُ خَبِيرٖ

ayah: إِن تَدۡعُوهُمۡ لَا يَسۡمَعُواْ دُعَآءَكُمۡ وَلَوۡ سَمِعُواْ مَا ٱسۡتَجَابُواْ لَكُمۡۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ يَكۡفُرُونَ بِشِرۡكِكُمۡۚ وَلَا يُنَبِّئُكَ مِثۡلُ خَبِيرٖ

ayah: ۞يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ أَنتُمُ ٱلۡفُقَرَآءُ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ وَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلۡغَنِيُّ ٱلۡحَمِيدُ
ayah_translit: yaayyuha al-nasu antumu al-fuqarau ila al-lahi wal-lahu huwa al-ghaniyu al-hamidu
ayah_english: O mankind! You (are) those in need of Allah while Allah He (is) Free of need the Praiseworthy

ayah: إِن يَشَأۡ يُذۡهِبۡكُمۡ وَيَأۡتِ بِخَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ
ayah_translit: in yasha yudh'hib'kum wayati bikhalqin jadidin
ayah_english: If He wills He (can) do away with you and bring in a creation new

ayah: وَمَا ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ بِعَزِيزٖ
ayah_translit: wama dhalika ala al-lahi bi'azizin
ayah_english: And not that (is) on Allah difficult

ayah: وَمَا ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ بِعَزِيزٖ
ayah_translit: wama dhalika ala al-lahi bi'azizin

ayah_translit: wama dhalika ala al-lahi bi'azizin

ayah: وَمَا ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ بِعَزِيزٖ
ayah_translit: wama dhalika ala al-lahi bi'azizin
ayah_english: And not that (is) on Allah difficult

ayah: وَمَا ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ بِعَزِيزٖ
ayah_translit: wama dhalika ala al-lahi bi'azizin
ayah_english: And not that (is) on Allah difficult

ayah: وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٞ وِزۡرَ أُخۡرَىٰۚ وَإِن تَدۡعُ مُثۡقَلَةٌ إِلَىٰ حِمۡلِهَا لَا يُحۡمَلۡ مِنۡهُ شَيۡءٞ وَلَوۡ كَانَ ذَا قُرۡبَىٰٓۗ إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَۚ وَمَن تَزَكَّىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَتَزَكَّىٰ لِنَفۡسِهِۦۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
ayah_translit: wala taziru waziratun wiz'ra ukh'ra wa-in tad'u muth'qalatun ila him'liha la yuh'mal min'hu shayon walaw kana dha qur'ba innama tundhiru alladhina yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi wa-aqamu al-salata waman tazakka fa-innama yatazakka linafsihi wa-ila al-lahi al-masiru
ayah_english: And not will bear bearer of burdens burden (of) another And if calls a heavily laden to (carry) its load not will be carried of it anything even if he be near of kin near of kin Only you can warn those who fear their Lord unseen and establish the prayer And whoever purifies himself then only he purifies for his own self And to Allah (is) the destination

ayah: وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٞ وِزۡرَ أُخۡرَىٰۚ وَإِن تَدۡعُ مُثۡقَلَةٌ إِلَىٰ حِمۡلِهَا لَا يُحۡمَلۡ مِنۡهُ شَيۡءٞ وَلَوۡ كَانَ ذَا قُرۡبَىٰٓۗ إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَۚ وَمَن تَزَكَّىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَتَزَكَّىٰ لِنَفۡسِهِۦۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ
ayah_translit: wala taziru waziratun wiz'ra ukh'ra wa-in tad'u muth'qalatun ila him'liha la yuh'mal min'hu shayon walaw kana dha qur'ba innama tundhiru alladhina yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi wa-aqamu al-salata waman tazakka fa-innama yatazakka linafsihi wa-ila al-lahi al-masiru

ayah: وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٞ وِزۡرَ أُخۡرَىٰۚ وَإِن تَدۡعُ مُثۡقَلَةٌ إِلَىٰ حِمۡلِهَا لَا يُحۡمَلۡ مِنۡهُ شَيۡءٞ وَلَوۡ كَانَ ذَا قُرۡبَىٰٓۗ إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَۚ وَمَن تَزَكَّىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَتَزَكَّىٰ لِنَفۡسِهِۦۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

ayah_english: And not will bear bearer of burdens burden (of) another And if calls a heavily laden to (carry) its load not will be carried of it anything even if he be near of kin near of kin Only you can warn those who fear their Lord unseen and establish the prayer And whoever purifies himself then only he purifies for his own self And to Allah (is) the destination

ayah: وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٞ وِزۡرَ أُخۡرَىٰۚ وَإِن تَدۡعُ مُثۡقَلَةٌ إِلَىٰ حِمۡلِهَا لَا يُحۡمَلۡ مِنۡهُ شَيۡءٞ وَلَوۡ كَانَ ذَا قُرۡبَىٰٓۗ إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَۚ وَمَن تَزَكَّىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَتَزَكَّىٰ لِنَفۡسِهِۦۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

ayah: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡأَعۡمَىٰ وَٱلۡبَصِيرُ
ayah_translit: wama yastawi al-a'ma wal-basiru
ayah_english: And not equal (are) the blind and the seeing

ayah: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡأَعۡمَىٰ وَٱلۡبَصِيرُ
ayah_translit: wama yastawi al-a'ma wal-basiru

ayah: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡأَعۡمَىٰ وَٱلۡبَصِيرُ
ayah_translit: wama yastawi al-a'ma wal-basiru
ayah_english: And not equal (are) the blind and the seeing

ayah: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡأَعۡمَىٰ وَٱلۡبَصِيرُ
ayah_translit: wama yastawi al-a'ma wal-basiru
ayah_english: And not equal (are) the blind and the seeing

ayah: وَلَا ٱلظُّلُمَٰتُ وَلَا ٱلنُّورُ
ayah_translit: wala al-zulumatu wala al-nuru
ayah_english: And not the darkness[es] and not [the] light

ayah: وَلَا ٱلظُّلُمَٰتُ وَلَا ٱلنُّورُ
ayah_translit: wala al-zulumatu wala al-nuru

ayah: وَلَا ٱلظُّلُمَٰتُ وَلَا ٱلنُّورُ
ayah_translit: wala al-zulumatu wala al-nuru

ayah: وَلَا ٱلظُّلُمَٰتُ وَلَا ٱلنُّورُ
ayah_translit: wala al-zulumatu wala al-nuru
ayah_english: And not the darkness[es] and not [the] light

ayah: وَلَا ٱلظِّلُّ وَلَا ٱلۡحَرُورُ
ayah_translit: wala al-zilu wala al-haruru
ayah_english: And not the shade and not the heat

ayah: وَلَا ٱلظِّلُّ وَلَا ٱلۡحَرُورُ
ayah_translit: wala al-zilu wala al-haruru
ayah_english: And not the shade and not the heat

ayah: وَلَا ٱلظِّلُّ وَلَا ٱلۡحَرُورُ
ayah_translit: wala al-zilu wala al-haruru
ayah_english: And not the shade and not the heat

ayah: وَلَا ٱلظِّلُّ وَلَا ٱلۡحَرُورُ
ayah_translit: wala al-zilu wala al-haruru
ayah_english: And not the shade and not the heat

ayah: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡأَحۡيَآءُ وَلَا ٱلۡأَمۡوَٰتُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسۡمِعُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ بِمُسۡمِعٖ مَّن فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ
ayah_translit: wama yastawi al-ahyau wala al-amwatu inna al-laha yus'mi'u man yashau wama anta bimus'mi'in man fi al-quburi
ayah_english: And not equal (are) the living and not the dead Indeed Allah causes to hear whom He wills and not you can make hear (those) who (are) in the graves

ayah: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡأَحۡيَآءُ وَلَا ٱلۡأَمۡوَٰتُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسۡمِعُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ بِمُسۡمِعٖ مَّن فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

ayah: إِنۡ أَنتَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ
ayah_translit: in anta illa nadhirun
ayah_english: Not you (are) but a warner

ayah: إِنۡ أَنتَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ
ayah_translit: in anta illa nadhirun
ayah_english: Not you (are) but a warner

ayah: إِنۡ أَنتَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ
ayah_translit: in anta illa nadhirun
ayah_english: Not you (are) but a warner

ayah: إِنۡ أَنتَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ
ayah_translit: in anta illa nadhirun
ayah_english: Not you (are) but a warner

ayah: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗاۚ وَإِن مِّنۡ أُمَّةٍ إِلَّا خَلَا فِيهَا نَذِيرٞ
ayah_translit: inna arsalnaka bil-haqi bashiran wanadhiran wa-in min ummatin illa khala fiha nadhirun
ayah_english: Indeed We [We] have sent you with the truth (as) a bearer of glad tidings and (as) a warner And not (was) any nation but had passed within it a warner

ayah: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ بَشِيرٗا وَنَذِيرٗاۚ وَإِن مِّنۡ أُمَّةٍ إِلَّا خَلَا فِيهَا نَذِيرٞ
ayah_translit: inna arsalnaka bil-haqi bashiran wanadhiran wa-in min ummatin illa khala fiha nadhirun
ayah_english: Indeed We [We] have sent you with the truth (as) a bearer of glad tidings and (as) a warner And not (was) any nation but had passed within it a warner

ayah: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ جَآءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَبِٱلزُّبُرِ وَبِٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ٱلۡمُنِيرِ
ayah_translit: wa-in yukadhibuka faqad kadhaba alladhina min qablihim jaathum rusuluhum bil-bayinati wabil-zuburi wabil-kitabi al-muniri
ayah_english: And if they deny you then certainly denied those who (were) before them (were) before them Came to them their Messengers with clear signs and with Scriptures and with the Book [the] enlightening

ayah: وَإِن يُكَذِّبُوكَ فَقَدۡ كَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ جَآءَتۡهُمۡ رُسُلُهُم بِٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَبِٱلزُّبُرِ وَبِٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ٱلۡمُنِيرِ

ayah: ثُمَّ أَخَذۡتُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
ayah_translit: thumma akhadhtu alladhina kafaru fakayfa kana nakiri
ayah_english: Then I seized those who disbelieved and how was My rejection!

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا بِهِۦ ثَمَرَٰتٖ مُّخۡتَلِفًا أَلۡوَٰنُهَاۚ وَمِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ جُدَدُۢ بِيضٞ وَحُمۡرٞ مُّخۡتَلِفٌ أَلۡوَٰنُهَا وَغَرَابِيبُ سُودٞ
ayah_translit: alam tara anna al-laha anzala mina al-samai maan fa-akhrajna bihi thamaratin mukh'talifan alwanuha wamina al-jibali judadun bidun wahum'run mukh'talifun alwanuha wagharabibu sudun
ayah_english: Do not you see that Allah sends down from the sky water then We bring forth therewith fruits (of) various [their] colors And in the mountains (are) tracts white and red (of) various [their] colors and intensely black and intensely black

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا بِهِۦ ثَمَرَٰتٖ مُّخۡتَلِفًا أَلۡوَٰنُهَاۚ وَمِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ جُدَدُۢ بِيضٞ وَحُمۡرٞ مُّخۡتَلِفٌ أَلۡوَٰنُهَا وَغَرَابِيبُ سُودٞ

ayah: أَلَمۡ تَرَ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَخۡرَجۡنَا بِهِۦ ثَمَرَٰتٖ مُّخۡتَلِفًا أَلۡوَٰنُهَاۚ وَمِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ جُدَدُۢ بِيضٞ وَحُمۡرٞ مُّخۡتَلِفٌ أَلۡوَٰنُهَا وَغَرَابِيبُ سُودٞ

ayah: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱلدَّوَآبِّ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ مُخۡتَلِفٌ أَلۡوَٰنُهُۥ كَذَٰلِكَۗ إِنَّمَا يَخۡشَى ٱللَّهَ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِ ٱلۡعُلَمَـٰٓؤُاْۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ غَفُورٌ
ayah_translit: wamina al-nasi wal-dawabi wal-an'ami mukh'talifun alwanuhu kadhalika innama yakhsha al-laha min ibadihi al-'ulamau inna al-laha azizun ghafurun
ayah_english: And among men and moving creatures and the cattle (are) various [their] colors likewise Only fear Allah among His slaves those who have knowledge Indeed Allah (is) All-Mighty Oft-Forgiving

ayah: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱلدَّوَآبِّ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ مُخۡتَلِفٌ أَلۡوَٰنُهُۥ كَذَٰلِكَۗ إِنَّمَا يَخۡشَى ٱللَّهَ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِ ٱلۡعُلَمَـٰٓؤُاْۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ غَفُورٌ
ayah_translit: wamina al-nasi wal-dawabi wal-an'ami mukh'talifun alwanuhu kadhalika innama yakhsha al-laha min ibadihi al-'ulamau inna al-laha azizun ghafurun
ayah_english: And among men and moving creatures and the cattle (are) various [their] colors likewise Only fear Allah among His slaves those who have knowledge Indeed Allah (is) All-Mighty Oft-Forgiving

ayah: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ وَٱلدَّوَآبِّ وَٱلۡأَنۡعَٰمِ مُخۡتَلِفٌ أَلۡوَٰنُهُۥ كَذَٰلِكَۗ إِنَّمَا يَخۡشَى ٱللَّهَ مِنۡ عِبَادِهِ ٱلۡعُلَمَـٰٓؤُاْۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَزِيزٌ غَفُورٌ

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتۡلُونَ كِتَٰبَ ٱللَّهِ وَأَقَامُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأَنفَقُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقۡنَٰهُمۡ سِرّٗا وَعَلَانِيَةٗ يَرۡجُونَ تِجَٰرَةٗ لَّن تَبُورَ
ayah_translit: inna alladhina yatluna kitaba al-lahi wa-aqamu al-salata wa-anfaqu mimma razaqnahum sirran wa'alaniyatan yarjuna tijaratan lan tabura
ayah_english: Indeed those who recite (the) Book (of) Allah and establish the prayer and spend out of what We have provided them secretly and openly hope (for) a commerce never it will perish

ayah_translit: inna alladhina yatluna kitaba al-lahi wa-aqamu al-salata wa-anfaqu mimma razaqnahum sirran wa'alaniyatan yarjuna tijaratan lan tabura

ayah: لِيُوَفِّيَهُمۡ أُجُورَهُمۡ وَيَزِيدَهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ غَفُورٞ شَكُورٞ
ayah_translit: liyuwaffiyahum ujurahum wayazidahum min fadlihi innahu ghafurun shakurun
ayah_english: That He may give them in full their rewards and increase for them of His Bounty Indeed He (is) Oft-Forgiving Most Appreciative
word_tranlation: That He may give them in full

ayah: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ مِنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ لَخَبِيرُۢ بَصِيرٞ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhi awhayna ilayka mina al-kitabi huwa al-haqu musaddiqan lima bayna yadayhi inna al-laha bi'ibadihi lakhabirun basirun
ayah_english: And (that) which We have revealed to you of the Book it (is) the truth confirming what (was) before it before it Indeed Allah of His slaves surely, (is) All-Aware All-Seer

ayah: وَٱلَّذِيٓ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ مِنَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ مُصَدِّقٗا لِّمَا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡهِۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ لَخَبِيرُۢ بَصِيرٞ

ayah: ثُمَّ أَوۡرَثۡنَا ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱصۡطَفَيۡنَا مِنۡ عِبَادِنَاۖ فَمِنۡهُمۡ ظَالِمٞ لِّنَفۡسِهِۦ وَمِنۡهُم مُّقۡتَصِدٞ وَمِنۡهُمۡ سَابِقُۢ بِٱلۡخَيۡرَٰتِ بِإِذۡنِ ٱللَّهِۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ ٱلۡكَبِيرُ
ayah_translit: thumma awrathna al-kitaba alladhina is'tafayna min ibadina famin'hum zalimun linafsihi wamin'hum muq'tasidun wamin'hum sabiqun bil-khayrati bi-idh'ni al-lahi dhalika huwa al-fadlu al-kabiru
ayah_english: Then We caused to inherit the Book those whom We have chosen of Our slaves and among them (is he) who wrongs himself and among them (is he who is) moderate and among them (is he who is) foremost in good deeds by permission (of) Allah That is the Bounty the great

ayah_translit: thumma awrathna al-kitaba alladhina is'tafayna min ibadina famin'hum zalimun linafsihi wamin'hum muq'tasidun wamin'hum sabiqun bil-khayrati bi-idh'ni al-lahi dhalika huwa al-fadlu al-kabiru

ayah: جَنَّـٰتُ عَدۡنٖ يَدۡخُلُونَهَا يُحَلَّوۡنَ فِيهَا مِنۡ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٖ وَلُؤۡلُؤٗاۖ وَلِبَاسُهُمۡ فِيهَا حَرِيرٞ
ayah_translit: jannatu adnin yadkhulunaha yuhallawna fiha min asawira min dhahabin walu'lu-an walibasuhum fiha harirun
ayah_english: Gardens (of) Eternity they will enter them They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearls and their garments therein (will be of) silk

ayah: وَقَالُواْ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَذۡهَبَ عَنَّا ٱلۡحَزَنَۖ إِنَّ رَبَّنَا لَغَفُورٞ شَكُورٌ
ayah_translit: waqalu al-hamdu lillahi alladhi adhhaba anna al-hazana inna rabbana laghafurun shakurun
ayah_english: And they (will) say All praises (be) to Allah the One Who (has) removed from us the sorrow Indeed our Lord (is) surely Oft-Forgiving Most Appreciative

ayah: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحَلَّنَا دَارَ ٱلۡمُقَامَةِ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ لَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا نَصَبٞ وَلَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا لُغُوبٞ
ayah_translit: alladhi ahallana dara al-muqamati min fadlihi la yamassuna fiha nasabun wala yamassuna fiha lughubun
ayah_english: The One Who has settled us (in) a Home (of) Eternity (out) of His Bounty Not touches us therein any fatigue and not touches therein weariness

ayah: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَحَلَّنَا دَارَ ٱلۡمُقَامَةِ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ لَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا نَصَبٞ وَلَا يَمَسُّنَا فِيهَا لُغُوبٞ

ayah_english: The One Who has settled us (in) a Home (of) Eternity (out) of His Bounty Not touches us therein any fatigue and not touches therein weariness

ayah: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَهُمۡ نَارُ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يُقۡضَىٰ عَلَيۡهِمۡ فَيَمُوتُواْ وَلَا يُخَفَّفُ عَنۡهُم مِّنۡ عَذَابِهَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي كُلَّ كَفُورٖ
ayah_translit: wa-alladhina kafaru lahum naru jahannama la yuq'da alayhim fayamutu wala yukhaffafu anhum min adhabiha kadhalika najzi kulla kafurin
ayah_english: And those who disbelieve for them (will be the) Fire (of) Hell Not is decreed for them that they die and not will be lightened for them of its torment Thus We recompense every ungrateful one

ayah: وَهُمۡ يَصۡطَرِخُونَ فِيهَا رَبَّنَآ أَخۡرِجۡنَا نَعۡمَلۡ صَٰلِحًا غَيۡرَ ٱلَّذِي كُنَّا نَعۡمَلُۚ أَوَلَمۡ نُعَمِّرۡكُم مَّا يَتَذَكَّرُ فِيهِ مَن تَذَكَّرَ وَجَآءَكُمُ ٱلنَّذِيرُۖ فَذُوقُواْ فَمَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مِن نَّصِيرٍ
ayah_translit: wahum yastarikhuna fiha rabbana akhrij'na na'mal salihan ghayra alladhi kunna na'malu awalam nu'ammir'kum ma yatadhakkaru fihi man tadhakkara wajaakumu al-nadhiru fadhuqu fama lilzzalimina min nasirin
ayah_english: And they will cry therein Our Lord! Bring us out we will do righteous (deeds) other than (that) which we used (to) do Did not We give you life long enough that (would) receive admonition therein whoever receives admonition And came to you the warner So taste then not (is) for the wrongdoers any helper

ayah: وَهُمۡ يَصۡطَرِخُونَ فِيهَا رَبَّنَآ أَخۡرِجۡنَا نَعۡمَلۡ صَٰلِحًا غَيۡرَ ٱلَّذِي كُنَّا نَعۡمَلُۚ أَوَلَمۡ نُعَمِّرۡكُم مَّا يَتَذَكَّرُ فِيهِ مَن تَذَكَّرَ وَجَآءَكُمُ ٱلنَّذِيرُۖ فَذُوقُواْ فَمَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مِن نَّصِيرٍ

ayah_english: And they will cry therein Our Lord! Bring us out we will do righteous (deeds) other than (that) which we used (to) do Did not We give you life long enough that (would) receive admonition therein whoever receives admonition And came to you the warner So taste then not (is) for the wrongdoers any helper

ayah: وَهُمۡ يَصۡطَرِخُونَ فِيهَا رَبَّنَآ أَخۡرِجۡنَا نَعۡمَلۡ صَٰلِحًا غَيۡرَ ٱلَّذِي كُنَّا نَعۡمَلُۚ أَوَلَمۡ نُعَمِّرۡكُم مَّا يَتَذَكَّرُ فِيهِ مَن تَذَكَّرَ وَجَآءَكُمُ ٱلنَّذِيرُۖ فَذُوقُواْ فَمَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مِن نَّصِيرٍ
ayah_translit: wahum yastarikhuna fiha rabbana akhrij'na na'mal salihan ghayra alladhi kunna na'malu awalam nu'ammir'kum ma yatadhakkaru fihi man tadhakkara wajaakumu al-nadhiru fadhuqu fama lilzzalimina min nasirin

ayah: وَهُمۡ يَصۡطَرِخُونَ فِيهَا رَبَّنَآ أَخۡرِجۡنَا نَعۡمَلۡ صَٰلِحًا غَيۡرَ ٱلَّذِي كُنَّا نَعۡمَلُۚ أَوَلَمۡ نُعَمِّرۡكُم مَّا يَتَذَكَّرُ فِيهِ مَن تَذَكَّرَ وَجَآءَكُمُ ٱلنَّذِيرُۖ فَذُوقُواْ فَمَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مِن نَّصِيرٍ
ayah_translit: wahum yastarikhuna fiha rabbana akhrij'na na'mal salihan ghayra alladhi kunna na'malu awalam nu'ammir'kum ma yatadhakkaru fihi man tadhakkara wajaakumu al-nadhiru fadhuqu fama lilzzalimina min nasirin

ayah: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَٰلِمُ غَيۡبِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
ayah_translit: inna al-laha alimu ghaybi al-samawati wal-ardi innahu alimun bidhati al-suduri
ayah_english: Indeed Allah (is the) Knower (of the) unseen (of) the heavens and the earth Indeed, He (is the) All-Knower of what (is) in the breasts of what (is) in the breasts

ayah_english: Indeed Allah (is the) Knower (of the) unseen (of) the heavens and the earth Indeed, He (is the) All-Knower of what (is) in the breasts of what (is) in the breasts

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَكُمۡ خَلَـٰٓئِفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ فَمَن كَفَرَ فَعَلَيۡهِ كُفۡرُهُۥۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ كُفۡرُهُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ إِلَّا مَقۡتٗاۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ كُفۡرُهُمۡ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا
ayah_translit: huwa alladhi ja'alakum khalaifa fi al-ardi faman kafara fa'alayhi kuf'ruhu wala yazidu al-kafirina kuf'ruhum inda rabbihim illa maqtan wala yazidu al-kafirina kuf'ruhum illa khasaran
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who made you successors in the earth And whoever disbelieves then upon him (is) his disbelief And not increase the disbelievers their disbelief near their Lord except (in) hatred and not increase the disbelievers their disbelief except (in) loss

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَكُمۡ خَلَـٰٓئِفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ فَمَن كَفَرَ فَعَلَيۡهِ كُفۡرُهُۥۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ كُفۡرُهُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ إِلَّا مَقۡتٗاۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ كُفۡرُهُمۡ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا

ayah: هُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَكُمۡ خَلَـٰٓئِفَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ فَمَن كَفَرَ فَعَلَيۡهِ كُفۡرُهُۥۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ كُفۡرُهُمۡ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ إِلَّا مَقۡتٗاۖ وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ كُفۡرُهُمۡ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا

ayah_translit: huwa alladhi ja'alakum khalaifa fi al-ardi faman kafara fa'alayhi kuf'ruhu wala yazidu al-kafirina kuf'ruhum inda rabbihim illa maqtan wala yazidu al-kafirina kuf'ruhum illa khasaran
ayah_english: He (is) the One Who made you successors in the earth And whoever disbelieves then upon him (is) his disbelief And not increase the disbelievers their disbelief near their Lord except (in) hatred and not increase the disbelievers their disbelief except (in) loss

ayah: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ شُرَكَآءَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شِرۡكٞ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ أَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا فَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَتٖ مِّنۡهُۚ بَلۡ إِن يَعِدُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ بَعۡضُهُم بَعۡضًا إِلَّا غُرُورًا
ayah_translit: qul ara-aytum shurakaakumu alladhina tad'una min duni al-lahi aruni madha khalaqu mina al-ardi am lahum shir'kun fi al-samawati am ataynahum kitaban fahum ala bayyinatin min'hu bal in ya'idu al-zalimuna ba'duhum ba'dan illa ghururan
ayah_english: Say Have you seen your partners those whom you call besides besides Allah Show Me what they have created from the earth or for them (is) a share in the heavens Or have We given them a Book so they (are) on a clear proof therefrom Nay not promise the wrongdoers some of them (to) others except delusion

ayah: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ شُرَكَآءَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شِرۡكٞ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ أَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا فَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَتٖ مِّنۡهُۚ بَلۡ إِن يَعِدُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ بَعۡضُهُم بَعۡضًا إِلَّا غُرُورًا

ayah_translit: qul ara-aytum shurakaakumu alladhina tad'una min duni al-lahi aruni madha khalaqu mina al-ardi am lahum shir'kun fi al-samawati am ataynahum kitaban fahum ala bayyinatin min'hu bal in ya'idu al-zalimuna ba'duhum ba'dan illa ghururan
ayah_english: Say Have you seen your partners those whom you call besides besides Allah Show Me what they have created from the earth or for them (is) a share in the heavens Or have We given them a Book so they (are) on a clear proof therefrom Nay not promise the wrongdoers some of them (to) others except delusion

ayah: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ شُرَكَآءَكُمُ ٱلَّذِينَ تَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شِرۡكٞ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ أَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا فَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَيِّنَتٖ مِّنۡهُۚ بَلۡ إِن يَعِدُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ بَعۡضُهُم بَعۡضًا إِلَّا غُرُورًا

ayah_english: Say Have you seen your partners those whom you call besides besides Allah Show Me what they have created from the earth or for them (is) a share in the heavens Or have We given them a Book so they (are) on a clear proof therefrom Nay not promise the wrongdoers some of them (to) others except delusion

ayah: ۞إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُمۡسِكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ أَن تَزُولَاۚ وَلَئِن زَالَتَآ إِنۡ أَمۡسَكَهُمَا مِنۡ أَحَدٖ مِّنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ حَلِيمًا غَفُورٗا
ayah_translit: inna al-laha yum'siku al-samawati wal-arda an tazula wala-in zalata in amsakahuma min ahadin min ba'dihi innahu kana haliman ghafuran
ayah_english: Indeed Allah upholds the heavens and the earth lest they cease And if they should cease not can uphold them any one after Him after Him Indeed, He is Most Forbearing Oft-Forgiving

ayah: ۞إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُمۡسِكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ أَن تَزُولَاۚ وَلَئِن زَالَتَآ إِنۡ أَمۡسَكَهُمَا مِنۡ أَحَدٖ مِّنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ حَلِيمًا غَفُورٗا

ayah: ۞إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُمۡسِكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ أَن تَزُولَاۚ وَلَئِن زَالَتَآ إِنۡ أَمۡسَكَهُمَا مِنۡ أَحَدٖ مِّنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ حَلِيمًا غَفُورٗا
ayah_translit: inna al-laha yum'siku al-samawati wal-arda an tazula wala-in zalata in amsakahuma min ahadin min ba'dihi innahu kana haliman ghafuran
ayah_english: Indeed Allah upholds the heavens and the earth lest they cease And if they should cease not can uphold them any one after Him after Him Indeed, He is Most Forbearing Oft-Forgiving

ayah: وَأَقۡسَمُواْ بِٱللَّهِ جَهۡدَ أَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ لَئِن جَآءَهُمۡ نَذِيرٞ لَّيَكُونُنَّ أَهۡدَىٰ مِنۡ إِحۡدَى ٱلۡأُمَمِۖ فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مَّا زَادَهُمۡ إِلَّا نُفُورًا
ayah_translit: wa-aqsamu bil-lahi jahda aymanihim la-in jaahum nadhirun layakununna ahda min ih'da al-umami falamma jaahum nadhirun ma zadahum illa nufuran
ayah_english: And they swore by Allah (the) strongest (of) their oaths that if came to them a warner surely they would be more guided than any (of) the nations But when came to them a warner not it increased them but (in) aversion

ayah: وَأَقۡسَمُواْ بِٱللَّهِ جَهۡدَ أَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ لَئِن جَآءَهُمۡ نَذِيرٞ لَّيَكُونُنَّ أَهۡدَىٰ مِنۡ إِحۡدَى ٱلۡأُمَمِۖ فَلَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مَّا زَادَهُمۡ إِلَّا نُفُورًا

ayah_translit: wa-aqsamu bil-lahi jahda aymanihim la-in jaahum nadhirun layakununna ahda min ih'da al-umami falamma jaahum nadhirun ma zadahum illa nufuran

ayah: ٱسۡتِكۡبَارٗا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَكۡرَ ٱلسَّيِّيِٕۚ وَلَا يَحِيقُ ٱلۡمَكۡرُ ٱلسَّيِّئُ إِلَّا بِأَهۡلِهِۦۚ فَهَلۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا سُنَّتَ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَۚ فَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗاۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّتِ ٱللَّهِ تَحۡوِيلًا
ayah_translit: is'tik'baran fi al-ardi wamakra al-sayi-i wala yahiqu al-makru al-sayi-u illa bi-ahlihi fahal yanzuruna illa sunnata al-awalina falan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdilan walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tahwilan
ayah_english: (Due to) arrogance in the land and plotting (of) the evil but not encompasses the plot (of) the evil except its own people Then do they wait except (the) way (of) the former (people) But never you will find in (the) way (of) Allah any change and never you will find in (the) way (of) Allah any alteration

ayah_english: (Due to) arrogance in the land and plotting (of) the evil but not encompasses the plot (of) the evil except its own people Then do they wait except (the) way (of) the former (people) But never you will find in (the) way (of) Allah any change and never you will find in (the) way (of) Allah any alteration

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ وَكَانُوٓاْ أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُمۡ قُوَّةٗۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعۡجِزَهُۥ مِن شَيۡءٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَلِيمٗا قَدِيرٗا
ayah_translit: awalam yasiru fi al-ardi fayanzuru kayfa kana aqibatu alladhina min qablihim wakanu ashadda min'hum quwwatan wama kana al-lahu liyu'jizahu min shayin fi al-samawati wala fi al-ardi innahu kana aliman qadiran
ayah_english: Have they not traveled in the land and seen how was (the) end (of) those who (were) before them (were) before them And they were stronger than them (in) power But not is Allah that can escape (from) Him any thing in the heavens and not in the earth Indeed, He is All-Knower All-Powerful

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَيَنظُرُواْ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ وَكَانُوٓاْ أَشَدَّ مِنۡهُمۡ قُوَّةٗۚ وَمَا كَانَ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعۡجِزَهُۥ مِن شَيۡءٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَلِيمٗا قَدِيرٗا

ayah_translit: awalam yasiru fi al-ardi fayanzuru kayfa kana aqibatu alladhina min qablihim wakanu ashadda min'hum quwwatan wama kana al-lahu liyu'jizahu min shayin fi al-samawati wala fi al-ardi innahu kana aliman qadiran
ayah_english: Have they not traveled in the land and seen how was (the) end (of) those who (were) before them (were) before them And they were stronger than them (in) power But not is Allah that can escape (from) Him any thing in the heavens and not in the earth Indeed, He is All-Knower All-Powerful

ayah: وَلَوۡ يُؤَاخِذُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّاسَ بِمَا كَسَبُواْ مَا تَرَكَ عَلَىٰ ظَهۡرِهَا مِن دَآبَّةٖ وَلَٰكِن يُؤَخِّرُهُمۡ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗىۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ بَصِيرَۢا
ayah_translit: walaw yuakhidhu al-lahu al-nasa bima kasabu ma taraka ala zahriha min dabbatin walakin yu-akhiruhum ila ajalin musamman fa-idha jaa ajaluhum fa-inna al-laha kana bi'ibadihi basiran
ayah_english: And if Allah (were to) punish Allah (were to) punish the people for what they have earned not He would leave on its back any creature But He gives them respite till a term appointed And when comes their term then indeed Allah is of His slaves All-Seer

ayah: وَلَوۡ يُؤَاخِذُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلنَّاسَ بِمَا كَسَبُواْ مَا تَرَكَ عَلَىٰ ظَهۡرِهَا مِن دَآبَّةٖ وَلَٰكِن يُؤَخِّرُهُمۡ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمّٗىۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ أَجَلُهُمۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِعِبَادِهِۦ بَصِيرَۢا
